SEARCH
Package bll

Class OrderBLL

java.lang.Object
bll.OrderBLL
public class OrderBLL extends Object
The OrderBLL class represents the business logic layer for managing Orders entities. It provides methods for finding, creating, updating, and deleting Order objects.

  • Method Details

    • findOrderById

      public Orders findOrderById(int id)
      Finds an order by the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the order to find.
      Returns:
      The Orders object if found.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - If no order with the specified ID is found.

    • findAll

      public List<Orders> findAll()
      Retrieves a list of all orders from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of Orders objects.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - If there are no orders in the database.

      Creates a new order in the database.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The created Orders object.

      Returns:
      The updated Orders object.

      Returns:
